description: bzip2 compress/decompress stream filter implementation.  Performs inline compression/decompression using the bzip2 algorythm on any PHP I/O stream.  The data produced by this filter, while compatable with the payload portion of a bz2 file, does not include headers or tailers for full bz2 file compatability.  To achieve this format, use the compress.bzip2:// fopen wrapper built directly into PHP.
name: bz2_filter

1.1.0.releaseNotes: Port bugfixes and persistency safety from core

summary: bz2 filter implementation backport for PHP 5.0
